text: Majid Gharizadeh is an Iranian filmmaker. He won the Crystal Simorgh for writing the script of his directorial debut The Grandfather (1985).Bio Other films include: * Good friends (2015) * Brick Boys (2006) * Youth (1998) * Today's Woman (1996) * Restless (1373) * Shaghayegh (1991) * My daughter Sahar (1989) * Land of Wishes (1987) ==References== category:Iranian directors Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Crystal Simorgh for Best Screenplay winners
